function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Implement strict travel restrictions, quarantine measures, and international collaboration in containment efforts","category":"Quarantine best practices for risk communication","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Segregation and separate disposal of medical waste","category":"Greywater
